## Discussion

Typically, you don’t need to create a `PDFSelection` object, but you can use an empty `PDFSelection` object as a container into which you can place selections, using [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFSelection] and addSelections.

# init(document:)

**Initializer**

Returns an empty `PDFSelection` object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(document: PDFDocument)
```

## Discussion

Typically, you don’t need to create a `PDFSelection` object, but you can use an empty `PDFSelection` object as a container into which you can place selections, using [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFSelection] and addSelections.
title: init(document:)
